title: Bank of America Rises 3%
text:
Bank of America Rises 3%

Stock Markets 23 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 12:29PM ET)

© Reuters. Bank of America Rises 3% Investing.com - Bank of America (NYSE: ) rose by 3.33% to trade at $30.11 by 12:27 (16:27 GMT) on Tuesday on the NYSE exchange. The volume of Bank of America shares traded since the start of the session was 35.37M. Bank of America has traded in a range of $29.11 to $30.14 on the day. The stock has traded at $30.1700 at its highest and $27.4600 at its lowest during the past seven days.

Bank of America Rises 3%
